website_summaries.verdict: An invigorating natural bodywash you can feel good about using on your skin.
pros: Creamy, luxurious texture that goes on smoothly and washes off easily
cons: Does not lather quite as much as the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.  No more dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this. I've been using Aveeno which I thought was pretty solid. Because of all the lotion in it, my skin felt soft after a shower. It would always dry back out withing a couple hours though. This weleda wash did not make my skin feel soft right after a shower, hence the skepticism. After this past month, however, I don't even have to use lotion anymore. My skin doesn't dry out. I swear by this stuff now. I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing body wash that also cleanses better than any soap I’ve ever used. Last Halloween, I dressed up as a skeleton with full black/white theatrical face paint (Mehron CreamBlend Stick). At the end of the night when it was time to wash my face and go to bed, none of my regular facial cleansers could clean my face. The only thing that worked was the sea buckthorn body wash. It was unbelievable how well it worked and how completely gentle it was. I had scrubbed and scrubbed with multiple facial cleansers and gotten nowhere but with just a few drops of sea buckthorn body wash I removed all the face paint with almost no effort. Total life-saver.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled by scent
customer_reviews.text: This body wash does feel nice on my skin however I was disappointed with the smell. I was searching for an almond scented body wash and found this. Not sure if I misread the description but this has a very faint smell in the bottle, nothing like any almond I've even smelled. Does not leave a fragrance on the skin. I can tell it's very healthy for my skin so no complaints there, it just doesn't lather very well either so I tend to use a lot more than average. Overall it's good, best for someone looking for a gentle pH balanced cleanser rather than someone looking for scent.
customer_reviews.author: Usnotthem

customer_reviews.title: Citrus scented soft cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This has a creamy texture (borderline-lotion-y) and a bright, citrus scent. It's not a squeaky-clean cleanser, but it gets the job done while leaving skin soft. I have easily irritated skin, and have no reaction to this mild body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Good value for gentle and effective moisturizing soap
customer_reviews.text: I have used Weleda lotions before and was really excited to try their soap! This came in a very pleasing scent that seemed like it would be overpowering but ended up actually not even staying on my skin post-shower, and I had a little trouble opening the flip cap when my arthritic fingers started bothering me. It was great overall though, and I would still buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: nlpolak

customer_reviews.title: Weleda brand and is a stand alone or even better with Weleda Arnica Message Oil
customer_reviews.text: What did I like most? Weleda brand and it is pleasant enough and serves it's intended use. What I don't? Feels like a waste compared to Weleda's Arnica Message oil. So, if you had to choose, go with the oil. If you have the money to do both, than great. No problems with delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: strong lavender scent and nice formula
customer_reviews.text: I like to get lush shower products but didn’t want to spend the money in these trying times. this formula is pretty moisturizing and doesn’t foam/lather as much as many body washes, which isn’t a bad thing to me. the scent is STRONG!!!lavender so if you love straight lavender you will like it, but if you usually go for lavender vanilla or something sweeter it might not be for you. I probably will buy again and try other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic Weleda product
customer_reviews.text: I always used the Weleda cream body wash products, but saw this and decided to give it a shot. This is a clear gel, and I think it's more "heavy duty" than the cream cleansers. Still, it is not drying at all. My skin feels great and really clean after using it. I really love the smell, as with all Weleda products, but that's just a matter of preference.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Not good for shaving
customer_reviews.text: I love Weleda products, and I love the way this wash smells. However, the texture is a bit slick like it sticks to my skin a little, and when I've tried to use this for shaving, I get razor burn. I'll stick with the Sea Buckthorn hand cream, which is silky and wonderful. For the shower, it's either Dr. Bronner's or Alaffia.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Best to use it during a hot shower, let it lather and sit on your skin for a few minutes. You can really feel it penetrating the skin. Always makes my tense shoulders and neck feel better. I also used this when I broke my ankle during recovery in the bath. Excellent product, wish it came in a bigger size bottle!
customer_reviews.author: celena

customer_reviews.title: Nice gel, ok scent.
customer_reviews.text: I like this gel, but I’m not crazy about the scent. It’s not as citrusy as I thought it would be. The natural floral undertone competes too much and makes it less refreshing, more heavy. I will try a different Weleda product just because I’ve heard so many good things and my skin is so sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Susu

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy +Moisturizing Shower Wash = All. Is ok with the world.
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing bath wash. Strong fragrance of lavender is so relaxing. This is one of those that this aromatherapy works great. . I have been impressed with all well products from Weleda Their body washes ,body oils, deodorants ,men's facial hair, oral care,
customer_reviews.author: Kimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: A daily facial wash, I will not go without it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the end if the day as a face wash to remove makeup and it cleanses and hydrates my face and cleared up minor acne I had from clogged pores. I will not go without this product period. I am back buying it for a friend that had broken out with some acne on her chin. Weleda makes their products from plant extracts, just sayin!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Helena

customer_reviews.title: Fairly runny and the smell is not quite pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I love citrus scents for shampoo, conditioners, body wash and they are pretty hard to find. I was hoping I would find it in this one, but to no avail. This is a runny/creamy body wash but it runs out of the bottle pretty quickly and feels like it runs straight out of my hands and down the drain if I don't get it on the washcloth soon enough. It probably cleans well enough, I just don't enjoy the scent to want to buy it again. Very "earthy".
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this body wash. Smells good and is moisturizing. One star off for delivery. Package was stashed behind a flower pot where it got rained on overnight and the envelope dissolved in the rain. Not the first time that a package was left without anyone ringing the doorbell. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: NY Litchick

customer_reviews.title: Thin consistency
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product, but I found the consistency too thin and more would come out of the bottle and wash down the drain than I would like. The bottle was used up very quickly because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have used the Weleda massage oil - so I thought I would try this. It is very moisturizing and has a wonderful scent.
customer_reviews.author: ib

customer_reviews.title: expired
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t smell like almonds at all and it was expired when I received it. I love weleda and their other almond products are great but this one was meh.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Old Product
customer_reviews.text: You sold me old product. You cleared old product off your shelves. The product pictured shows 100% Natural, mine does not. I hate when this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Muffet 1954 💯🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I especially like that it is made in Europe. Their skin care products do not include the toxins that are allowed in the US.
customer_reviews.author: TJN

customer_reviews.title: Best soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s super moisturizing and smells soooooo good. A little expensive but well worth it for how soft and luscious my body feels after it. Super gentle on my skin too which is great since I have extremely sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Mads Guccione

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It is not the spray deodorant which I love. But I like it. I smells strong but after you dry it is a fabulous scent.
customer_reviews.author: Good

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It’s a delight to use - the citrus scent is invigorating and it has a texture that just glides over skin! It makes a nice lather without drying the skin. The only drawback is that I tend to use it up quickly but that may just be because I find it so much fun. Weleda makes EXCELLENT skin products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product for washing face and body.
customer_reviews.text: I always bought this product in health food stores when i lived in Europe, and was so glad to get it in US through Amazon. No harmful ingredients, great texture, best thing for washing my face. I prefer the lemon, but the others are good too, like lavender !
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i use the spray and love the scent. this body wash is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: blkbrrry

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and citrus-delivers exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I really like citrus body washes and this one is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Best citrus creamy body wash by WELEDA!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this line of natural skincare products. This creamy citrus body wash is refreshing and not drying at all, smells wonderful, too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: all natural body wash with a great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love Weleda products for being all natural and the scent of the buckthorn line has been a favorite for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! Great way to pamper yourself while on a budget !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Too thick and greasy feeling and the smell is atrocious
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great fresh scent plus moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: Love this body wash. Smells very fresh and moisturizes while showering. I will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for postpartum use and has helped sooth everything that needed to be. I like the smell it's not to strong and I am happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: LAJ1990

customer_reviews.title: didnt arrive, but weleda is awesome
customer_reviews.text: didn't arrive, so I ordered a new one. weleda of course, has the best products
customer_reviews.author: Dunja

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It smells and feels incredible. The smell doesn't linger once you are finished showering, however, and the bottle runs out pretty quickly. Will be buying a different body wash from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: love homeopathic everything welled
customer_reviews.text: love the smell and texture. wish it would be larger for the price, but overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GTprivatebeach

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Windex
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this wash but the evening primrose scent is super heavy and smells like windex/house cleaner. Considering trying another scent.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Gatzulis

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have heard great things about the Weleda brand and wanted to try the birch body scrub because I was looking for a more natural body exfoliator. Two things kind of turned me off... number one, the smell! It has a very strong citronella fragrance, very much like citronella candles that are supposed to ward off bugs. A little too much for my nose. And number two, after using it and then rinsing, I got out of the shower and noticed that I was covered in some sort of gritty residue from the little beads. They didn't want to fully rinse off! There are other Weleda products that I like, but this one just fell a little short for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I might have had a too high expectations from those reviews but I did not like the scent which makes me feel like throwing up and not as hydrating as it states. I like olay body soap way better. Too pricey for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell great and really moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This cleanser does what it's supposed to do. It cleans and moisturizers your skin. I have really dry, itchy winter skin and I'm always on the hunt for good products. This one is excellent. And it has a nice fresh scent that I love. Win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Janise

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just use a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except that you just use at least twice as much as normal body wash. The suds fade quickly and you must refresh your wash cloth several times during a shower. But perhaps that’s a small price to pay for how much better your skin feels.
customer_reviews.author: MeowMeowMeow

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works well with Waleda's Arnica massage oil. I love these products. This one isn't my 5 stars because I can tell I'm going to use this up fast ...
customer_reviews.author: MartysReads

customer_reviews.title: Worst Smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but this smell makes me nauseous. It doesn't smell fresh at all which is something I would like while using a body wash in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle
customer_reviews.text: This is the most gentle exfoliant I have ever found. I love the way it smells and it exfoliates without making your skin feel scratched up. I have noticed some times my skin will burn when I'm rinsing it off, but I think that has to do with the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with hard water. Good lather and great smell. I wanted something that did not dry out my skin. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Weleda!
customer_reviews.text: Just love Weleda. Used it in Germany and I am using it here :)
customer_reviews.author: Annilein

customer_reviews.title: Men. Not ladies. Yes! Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like men’s sports product. Scent lingers. Not pleasant to me.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, and is amazing for your body!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, and doesn’t have the toxins that other bath products provide. I’m in love with this company!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've found for my dry skin. Lasts all day, as opposed to my skin drying out after a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: A daily treat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely look forward to using this for my daily shower. It's got a pleasant scent, and I love that it's a cream. Feels very nourishing. One of the smaller luxuries, but worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: GenuineImitation

customer_reviews.title: This is really nice, creamy and moisturizing body wash without nasty chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, creamy and moisturizing body wash without nasty chemicals. It does not dry out your skin, and works well as a shaving cream for ladies, too. The packaging is recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and it works for me. No redness or itching. The scent is ok. No dryness after shower.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps your skin moisturized. Best all natural body wash out there
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful smell body wash! Very natural. I’m using for my son calendula series! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Iza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much needed for a single hardworking mom with super sore muscles
customer_reviews.author: Meows

customer_reviews.title: silky smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I love the smell and it makes your skin feel really smooth and soft. We tried this as we were wanting to try a product that was as organic and natural as we could find...we love it and are reluctantly sharing it with our teen daughter :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good, and doesn't dry my skin. This, plus a good price, is what I look for in a body wash and Weleda's got it. I like all of their scents, but this one really gets me going in the morning -- citrusy!
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, gets me clean without harmful chemicals. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: kunzang brown

customer_reviews.title: Smells way too strong
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super fast, but I don't like the product. It smells way too strong, like an old lemony fragranced household cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: KateWayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: So-So body wash
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is ok. Im not as impressed with it as I had hoped. The smell is alright and the body wash is also a little oily.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: my favorite body scrub
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized, without a greasy residue. The smell is AMAZING. I also love what the company stands for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, smells great and has a 0 toxin rating too
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath gel. It has a very fresh, clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: SLW

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, very creamy
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this body wash for a while now and every time I use it I feel like spring has finally arrived - even when I use it in the middle of the winter :) Some citrus scented body washes smell too strongly and really artificial but that is not the case with this one. They got the smell just perfect, I think. The consistency of this body wash is really creamy, if feels almost like a lotion and it really does seem to dry the skin out much less than most other shower gels. Overall, I am very happy with this and will probably keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love their line! Wish products were in larger more economical sizes.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: New Scent Is Lovely
customer_reviews.text: New scent. Very light. Still great quality! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GenuineImitation

customer_reviews.title: My favorite body wash
customer_reviews.text: Just about all weleda products are amazing. This smells divine, lathers really well, leaves skin soft and doesn't have unhealthy chemicals and preservatives in it.
customer_reviews.author: PSB

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we love all weleda products and our loyal users.... we also use the weleda baby line on our baby... love the holistic approach to the brand, the smells and mostly the price...
customer_reviews.author: GTprivatebeach

customer_reviews.title: If you like orange scent, you will love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this product in the cold winter - the fresh, orange scent lifts my spirits. And I love that it's not a "fake" scent, but real essential oils! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GaleO

customer_reviews.title: smells great! I would recommend using this paired with the ...
customer_reviews.text: smells great! I would recommend using this paired with the birch body oil as well. always satisfied with Weleda products :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, and very hydrating for my extremely dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is heavenly to me. The wash is creamy and hydrating. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Quemado

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Weleda
customer_reviews.text: Great size, perfect for the shower and even for travelling. Love the product, very smooth, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: The Powderhorn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it and have used it for the last 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: Lmbmjjw

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Not a good exfoliatant the beads are waxy like.. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath wash. Weleda always uses health conscious ingredients. This bath wash smells amazing and feels great afterwards, leaving my skin soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: EVC

customer_reviews.title: Weleda is always Number One for me
customer_reviews.text: Using this from past two years for my 4 year old son and both of us love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't so expensive for such a small bottle I would buy only this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Jasbon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't so expensive for such a small bottle I would buy only this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Jasbon

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Skin!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and a little goes a long way. My skin feels so smooth and I love the refreshing scent.
customer_reviews.author: phillygal

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Great size to take along, only need a dab, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: The Powderhorn

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is a great body exfoliator - smells wonderful, leaves skin feeling super soft! I am hairless and worked beautifully on my skin, and you don't have to use much product -- tried to get my husband to try it and a lot of product was just lost in his body hair... so probably best for the hairless areas.
customer_reviews.author: olke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this body wash and the moisturizing effect on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: Weleda Sea Buckthorn Body wash is different than other washes. It reduces skin irritation and I do believe that my skin, particularly on my neck and chest area, looks better--smoother and less of a tendancy to look dry and stressed.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: hated smell and did nothing like it said it did
customer_reviews.text: hated smell and did nothing like it said it did, to be fair I have extremely dry sensitive skin and nothing happened, didn't make it drier, but no added moisture, quite surprised because I hear such good things about sea buckthorn, but to be honest this has been my issue with all Weleda oils, lotions, and washes, I keep trying them for good reviews and just no results
customer_reviews.author: d8106red

customer_reviews.title: great as face wash
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a face wash, and it works wonderfully (after having tried loads of other products). No/very few break outs. I have sensitive combination skin and am in my late twenties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Citrus = Lime lollipop
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine body wash but it smells like green lime lollipops.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ferrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for men and women
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash!! Feels creamy and the scent is nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Five star favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic (as is most of the Weleda line of Sea Buck thorn products). You feel and look as though you have had a pedicure after putting a small amount on your feet. And a little bit goes a very long way. It is healing and softens the skin, second to none. I also enjoy the clean, but, mild orange-citrus fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Scotchauntie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent morning body wash
customer_reviews.text: I like this body wash for it's bright but gentle scent - it's so positive for morning time or when you're tired or you mood is down. And skin feels good after shower.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dont care for the smell, but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Lavrenova

customer_reviews.title: One of the best body washes I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best body washes I have ever used. Smells clean and not overpowering. Leaves skin soft, not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Vegan

customer_reviews.title: This product helped me feel more comfortable this season in shorts
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this product. I'm a 35 year old female and have issues with cellulite around my hips and thighs. I used this in conjunction with the body oil and saw big improvements in a matter of weeks. I'm very fit with a lean body type and have fought cellulite my entire life. This product helped me feel more comfortable this season in shorts:)
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it and will buy it again. Wonderful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Duped

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing and smells wonderful! Would purchase again to treat myself (usually I just purchase Target brand body wash). No notable difference with my skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great clean product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Doesn't foam much (probably cuz it isn't filled with chemicals) so I have to get used to that. But skin feels really clean after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Heatherly

customer_reviews.title: Weleda is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Weleda is one of the best highest quality skin care brand .. When I first migrated to US from India, I found the Wild Rose bodywash and the packaging was very classy .. I brought it home and fell in love at the first use .. It has been 10 years and my love has only increased for Weleda .. The hand creams, bodywashes, oils, perfumes, deodorants - all are top notch products .. And it's made in Europe and not tested on animals .. What else do you need!
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: Love these natural options!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more natural shower gel during pregnancy without too many chemicals and artificial dyes and the Weleda body washes are exactly what I was looking for. I've used both the pomegranate and the citrus scents and they both smell very pleasant and keep my skin moisturized. I should also add that a lot of the main stream shower gels and soaps irritate my skin, which the Weleda brand has never done. Wish they had more products readily available in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not unique
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. It smells wonderful and performs well. However, I don't see any unique qualities to the formulation, nor any special benefit for buying this brand. It seems a little expensive for something that isn't a "stand-out". I'll enjoy it until it's used up....but probably won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I think this is working!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product. Weleda is a quality company, so I thought I would try this I think I'm detecting a real improvement in the condition of the skin on my arms.I'm older, so I didn't know if there could be an improvement in my skin, but so far there is a softer but firmer appearance.
customer_reviews.author: florence anne johannes

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, organic scrub that leaves you soft & smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to only use natural skin care products. I have used Weleda for years. Their prices are great. Most well crafted organic items r VERY expensive. I love that there is no artificial fragrance. It has a slight lemony scent & give a mild exfoliation but u can increase it by using on dry skin. Leaves you very soft & I think even a man would enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: 1baldchick

product_meta.title: Weleda Invigorating Body Wash, Citrus Creamy - 6.8 Oz, 6.8 Ounces
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Citrus| Size:6.8 fl ozLemon equals optimism. Its essential oil has an immediately positive effect on your spirits. With our Citrus Creamy Body Wash, you’ll enjoy freshly cleaned skin, an elevation to your mood, and luminous moisture all over. Wake up, shower and add a smile to your day!
feature_bullets: Helps renew the look and feel of youthful skin.
